extendedInfo.description: What would your favourite movies look like if they were acted out by stick figures?Go Figure is a new kind of movie quiz game. We have drawn 200 movie scenes using stick figures. Some will be quite obvious. Others will be challenging for all but the biggest film buffs. You may need help from your friends to solve them; that's the idea of the game!The Free version of Go Figure comes with the first 200 movie scenes and occasional advertisements.The Premium version is advertisement free and features the following extra movie packs:* Horror pack* Cruise Control (the movies of Tom Cruise)* Cage Match (the movies of Nic Cage)* Go West (iconic Westerns)* More Bad Ways To Go (memorable movie deaths)We will continue to add more. Visit our Facebook page to vote for which movie packs we should create next

reviews.title: Great Game but ....
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this game that\'s why I bought it but I wish you could fix it from crashing and also fix the glitch where it doesn\'t save my progress. If you could fix it I really would enjoy this game a whole lot more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Life Changing Experience
reviews.comment: This game will give true film buffs the confidence of infinity.
reviews.author: Juan Costrada

reviews.title: So you think you\'re a movie buff?
reviews.comment: Well, don\'t call yourself one until you get this glorious app. I repeat, GLORIOUS.
reviews.author: Eddie Chong

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Love Cage match. Hours of trying to remember names of movies
reviews.author: Ange Bennetts

reviews.title: Awesome fun
reviews.comment: Great fun app. Had heaps of fun playing with my friends.
reviews.author: Jamie Simpson

reviews.title: So awesome.
reviews.comment: The extra content alone is worth the download
reviews.author: Jeff Willis
